Welcome in, Benny! There's a slight prob with your post, and that's 
the fact that all attacks have to be made in attempts (so he would 
attempt to slice the gun in half instead of just slicing it in half, 
and attempt to skewer the TF instead of just skewering the TF). Its 
up to the defending character to post whether the attacks hit or not.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@h...> wrote:
> And then, out of nowhere, a mysterious character leaps out of the 
shadows, 
> he slices the gun in half and then skewers the transformer with a 
long sharp 
> blade of energon.
>

holding the log
